scouts.title: Your Scouts
scouts.subtitle: Manage your AI scouts that continuously search and notify you
scouts.emptySubtitle: Create your first scout to start monitoring for updates

delete.title: Delete Scout
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{title}"? This action cannot be undone.

scout.startPrompt: Start by describing what you want to scout...
scout.inputPlaceholderDesktop: Describe what you'd like to scout and our agent will handle the rest...
scout.inputPlaceholderMobile: Describe what you'd like to scout...

emptyState.title: Create a new scout to get started

firecrawl.label: Firecrawl Integration
firecrawl.sponsoredDescription: Open Scouts provides a free Firecrawl API key for you to test the platform. This sponsored integration has limited credits. For unlimited usage, add your own API key below.
firecrawl.creditsExhausted: Sponsored credits exhausted. Add your own API key below for unlimited usage.

customKey.title: Your Own API Key
customKey.description: Add your own Firecrawl API key for unlimited usage. Your key will be used instead of the sponsored integration.
customKey.enterNewKey: Please enter a new API key

firecrawl.footer: Powered by Firecrawl - Web scraping for AI applications

location.label: Location
location.title: Your Location
location.description: Set your default location for scouts. This will be used when creating new scouts to provide location-aware search results.
location.footer: Your location helps scouts find relevant local results

notifications.label: Notifications
notifications.emailDescription: Scout notifications will be sent to your account email when your scouts find new results.

send.success: Test email sent! Check your inbox.
send.mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to send a test email. Please refresh the page and try again.

notifications.footer: More notification options (SMS, Slack, Discord) coming soon...
